title: Mark Decor
description:
This Scandinavian-inspired living space embodies the perfect balance between comfort and aesthetic appeal. The design celebrates natural light and organic materials while maintaining a clean, uncluttered environment.

Key features include a neutral color palette enhanced with subtle textures, iconic mid-century furniture pieces, and thoughtfully curated accessories that add character without overwhelming the space.
designElements: White oak flooring with matte finish
Custom built-in storage solutions with minimalist hardware
Wool and linen textiles in complementary neutral tones
Handcrafted ceramic accent pieces
Statement pendant lighting with warm-toned bulbs

title: Meridian
description:
This contemporary kitchen design marries functionality with sophisticated aesthetics. The space features clean lines, premium materials, and innovative storage solutions to create a chef's haven that's equally suited for casual family meals and elegant entertaining.

The meticulous planning ensures that every element serves a purpose while contributing to the overall visual harmony of the space.
designElements: Italian marble countertops with waterfall edge
Custom cabinetry with integrated hardware
Professional-grade stainless steel appliances
Handmade ceramic backsplash tiles
Ambient and task lighting with adjustable brightness

title: Decoraids
category: decorative wall panels and ceiling tiles
description:
This minimalist bedroom creates a tranquil sanctuary through thoughtful restraint. The design emphasizes quality over quantity, with each element carefully selected to contribute to an atmosphere of calm and relaxation.

The space demonstrates how simplicity, when executed with intention, can result in profound luxury and comfort.
designElements: Organic cotton and linen bedding in neutral tones
Built-in headboard with integrated nightstands
Natural wood flooring with handwoven area rug
Blackout window treatments with subtle texture
Minimalist lighting solutions for different moods

title: PU Panel
description:
This bohemian living space celebrates cultural fusion and artistic expression. The design incorporates global influences, layered textures, and a rich color palette to create a space that feels both curated and comfortably lived-in.

Rather than following rigid design rules, this space embraces the beauty of imperfection and personal expression.
designElements: Handwoven textiles from global artisans
Vintage and one-of-a-kind furniture pieces
Multi-layered ambient lighting with colored glass elements
Gallery wall with eclectic art collection
Indoor plants and natural elements throughout

title: Hardware
description:
This industrial workspace balances raw architectural elements with thoughtful design interventions to create a productive and inspiring environment. The design embraces the building's original character while introducing contemporary comforts and functionality.

The result is a space that stimulates creativity while providing practical solutions for modern work requirements.
designElements: Exposed brick walls preserved and sealed
Custom metal and reclaimed wood furniture
Adjustable task lighting with vintage-inspired fixtures
Modular storage systems with industrial hardware
Acoustic treatment disguised as architectural elements
